mapper.insert: insert into db_shopingtask (ITEMID, TASKID, ITEMFLAG, OPER, CREATETIME, OPENFLAG, USERID, OPERTIME, SITE, LASTRUNTIME) values (#{itemid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taskid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastruntime,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update db_shopingtask set TASKID = #{taskid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEMFLAG = #{itemflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SITE = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTRUNTIME = #{lastruntime,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ITEMID, TASKID, ITEMFLAG, OPER, CREATETIME, OPENFLAG, USERID, OPERTIME, SITE, LASTRUNTIME from db_shopingtask where ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ITEMID, TASKID, ITEMFLAG, OPER, CREATETIME, OPENFLAG, USERID, OPERTIME, SITE, LASTRUNTIME from db_shopingtask
